flag.name: wxTBK_BUTTONBAR
flag.description: Use wxButtonToolBar-based implementation under Mac OS (ignored under other platforms).

flag.name: wxTBK_HORZ_LAYOUT
flag.description: Shows the text and the icons alongside, not vertically stacked (only implement under Windows and GTK 2 platforms as it relies on wxTB_HORZ_LAYOUT flag support).

type.name: EVT_TOOLBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED
type.description: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOLBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

type.name: EVT_TOOLBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
type.description: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOLBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed (using wxNotifyEvent::Veto()).

bitmap.description: Bitmap shown alongside the label (default: none).

int.name: image
int.description: The zero-based index of the image associated with the item into the image list.

bool.name: selected
bool.description: Is the page selected initially (only one page can be selected; default: 0)?
